shortdef: having an education; especially : having an education beyond the average
giving evidence of training or practice : skilled

dt.t: chose to {wi}educate{/wi} their children at home

dt: {bc}to train by formal instruction and supervised practice especially in a skill, trade, or profession
{bc}to develop mentally, morally, or aesthetically especially by instruction

dt.t: {it}educating{/it} themselves about changes in the industry

dt: {bc}to persuade or condition to feel, believe, or act in a desired way

dt.t: {wi}educate{/wi} the public to support our position

pt: {sc}teach{/sc} {sc}instruct{/sc} {sc}educate{/sc} {sc}train{/sc} {sc}discipline{/sc} {sc}school{/sc} mean to cause to acquire knowledge or skill. {sc}teach{/sc} applies to any manner of imparting information or skill so that others may learn.

pt.t: {it}taught{/it} us a lot about our planet
more things than formal schooling serve to {it}educate{/it} a person

pt: {sc}train{/sc} stresses instruction and drill with a specific end in view.

pt.t: {it}trained{/it} foreign pilots to operate the new aircraft

pt: {sc}discipline{/sc} implies training in habits of order and precision.
{sc}school{/sc} implies training or disciplining especially in what is hard to master.

et: Middle English, to rear, from Latin {it}educatus{/it}, past participle of {it}educare{/it} to rear, educate, from {it}educere{/it} to lead forth {ma}{mat|educe|}{/ma}
shortdef: to train by formal instruction and supervised practice especially in a skill, trade, or profession
to develop mentally, morally, or aesthetically especially by instruction

dt: {bc}{d_link|educated|educate} by one's own efforts without formal instruction

dt.t: He was {wi}self-educated{/wi}, had taught himself German and French …

shortdef: educated by one's own efforts without formal instruction

dt.t: Libraries of all types, at their very roots, seek to provide people with the opportunity to explore knowledge and to {wi}self-educate{/wi} throughout their lives.
The important lesson is to {wi}self-educate{/wi} {gloss}=inform yourself{/gloss} and research products that are safe and beneficial for your pets.
